content.query:
SELECT  rate_code_id, rate_code 
    FROM
        OPENROWSET(
            BULK 'rate_code.json',
            DATA_SOURCE='nyc_green_taxi_data_raw',
            FORMAT = 'CSV',
            FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
            FIELDTERMINATOR ='0x0b',
            ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0b'
        ) 
        WITH (
            JSONDoc VARCHAR(MAX)
            )AS rate_code
        CROSS Apply OPENJSON(JSONDoc)
        WITH(
            rate_code_id TINYINT,
            rate_code    VARCHAR(20)
        );
